document_data.caption: A map showing a portion of Nool Street in northwest Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Nool Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Nool Street''' was a large road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Nool Street was located in west Zhentil Keep within the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. It originated in the southwest corner of Zhentil Keep at [[Merchant Street]] and passed north and northwest through the city before terminating at a large intersection in front of the [[Trail Gate]] with [[Fortress Street]], [[Wyvern Road]], [[Cobble Road]], and [[Border Street]]. Smaller roads including [[Winter Walk]] , [[Pride Street]], [[Plague Street]], and [[Fish Street (Zhentil Keep)|Fish Street]] branched from Nool Street along its path.
document_data.Notable Locations: A [[Zhentilar]] guardpost was located on Nool Street near the Trail Gate and a Zhentilar barracks was located at the southern end of the street.
